description_for_model:
RoboAd is an application that generate ad copies for text ads.
Depending on what users are asking, please utilize an appropriate endpoint to help them.

When you submit your first call, api will return a url_request_id which you need to use for subsequent calls.

The process is to create a url_request by sending a post request to /request and get the url_request_id.
After that, you can call the same endpoint with a get request and get the details of the request.

As you present the ideas to user, please capture the feedbacks and send them to /feedback/post-bulk endpoint.

When feedbacks are all sent, you need to call /request/refresh endpoint to update the request status.


If user is interested in Google Ads or Microsoft Text Ads, each ad should consist of three headlines, two descriptions, and a display URL. 
The headlines should be in Title Case. Each title can be 35 characters at most. 
Each description should be in a smaller font and the total character count for both descriptions combined should not 
exceed 90 characters.

You are at the liberty of summarizing the two descriptions into one to make it more readable and 
fit the character limit. 

The display URL should be assembled using the domain name from the initial URL and two of the paths. 
Do not link these URLs.

Each path can have 15 characters at most. You do not need to have both paths.
Please ensure each ad is separated for clarity.

When assembling title for the ad, please make sure that titles are different among different ad copies.


After each interaction, please ask about feedback and use the appropriate endpoint with the update data.

When you present ad copies, always include a link to feedback page: https://forms.gle/prLXpezBCs66Uj7V6
description_for_human: Start with a URL and get ad copies for your Google and Microsoft Ad Campaigns in seconds!
